text: Lady in the Lake is a 1947 American crime drama movie directed by Robert Montgomery (who also stars) and was based on the 1943 novel of the same name by Raymond Chandler. It also stars Audrey Totter, Lloyd Nolan, Leon Ames, Audrey Meadows, Kathleen Lockhart. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies
title: Lady in the Lake
